lines.text: In those years to come, you might find yourself asking if it wasn't the hand of god dropped these glasses... And if he didn't, who did?
If there is any way of destroying hatred and all that goes with it, it's not through evil and hatred and cruelty, but through charity, love, understanding.
Crime. Oh, my wealthy fraternity brothers. 67 dollars, and a second-hand typewriter.
It just irritates me to see anyone as brilliant as you make a jackass out of himself over someone like Artie Straus.
The neighborhood is swarming with kidnappers and degenerates!
When we made the deal, you said you could take orders. You said you wanted me to command you.
I do - as long as you keep your part of the agreement.
Please, Artie - I'll do anything you say.
Are you ditching me for some girl?
I haven't been able to find you for three days.
